data.actual_result: You are not focused on the message compose input
data.expected_result: You should be able to edit your message after pressing [ESC]
data.short_description: Exiting out of @ everyone confirmation doesn't put keyboard focus on message compose input
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with more than 30 people, and make sure you have permission to mention @ everyone - Write "@ everyone" (without the space), and tap enter - When the "hold up!" modal opens, press [ESC] - Try to type to edit your message
